hero.paraghraph: Sola Groups: Your Bridge to Quality Cars From the USA to worldwide

estimateCost.dialogDescription: Click Calculate cost when you're done.
estimateCost.total: The total cost at the destination port.

description.bid: Enter the amount you want to bid on the car
description.auction: Choose the auction in which the car is located.
description.source: Select the auction location where the car is located. You can find it in the car's details on the auction website.
description.country: Select the auction location where the car is located. You can find it in the car's details on the auction website.
description.port: Choose the port where you want the car to be delivered to you.
description.shippingLine: Choose the shipping line that will be used to transport the car.
description.shippingType: If you choose triple, the car will be shipped with two other cars in the same container. If you choose quadruple, it will be shipped with three other cars in the same container.
description.warehouse: Choose the port in the United States from which the car will be loaded. Note: The ports are listed from the least expensive to the most expensive.
description.vin: Enter the car's VIN number to get additional information about the car.

response.cost: The total cost of the car after calculating land and sea transportation costs and all fees.
response.inland: The cost of transporting the car within the United States from the auction branch to the loading port.
response.maritime: The cost of shipping the car from the United States to the destination port.
response.auctionFee: The fees for the auction from which the car was purchased. The fees vary depending on the bid amount.
response.additional: Car information based on the VIN.

faqsData.question: How does the online car bidding process work?
faqsData.answer: Users can browse a wide selection of vehicles listed on the platform, place bids in real-time auctions, and win vehicles if they have the highest bid.

faqsData.question: Why ship using a shipping container?
faqsData.answer: Shipping containers are used because they are standardized, secure, cost-effective, and easy to transport by ship, train, or truck, making global trade efficient.

faqsData.question: Can I transport a vehicle I purchased to another state or country?
faqsData.answer: Yes, we provide transportation services through our company, including international shipping.

faqsData.question: Can I inspect the vehicle before bidding?
faqsData.answer: Yes, most platforms like Copart provide detailed vehicle descriptions, photos, and condition reports.

welcomeData.welcomeParagraphOne: We provide a complete end-to-end service, starting with expert bidding on your preferred vehicles at US auctions.
welcomeData.welcomeParagraphTwo: We handle all the necessary paperwork and logistics, and ensuring safe and timely delivery to your specified location, wherever that may be..
